name: Novospec
overview:
Novospec develops hardware and software for remote sensing and spectroscopy applications, as well as mapping services by airborne sensors and satellite imagery.

Novospec excels in providing chemometric models to any quantitative application based on spectral data, as well as developing innovative solutions for the precise agriculture discipline, mineral exploration, monitoring of air and soil pollution, veterinary products assessments, civil engineering, medicine and more.

Novospecâ€™s products are based on state of the art research and development over years of service. Novospec designs and manufactures tools for spectral measurements and analysis, offering the best quantitative solutions for the customer. Novospec provides an end to end solutions and services from studying the problem at hand up to the final report and product to the customer.
